title: Kit sponsorship revenue of German Bundesliga clubs 2019/20
yAxis: Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros
summary: Overall Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros has decreased over the Year.

Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros is roughly constant from SC_Freiburg_(Schwarzwaldmilch) to SC_Paderborn_(Sunmaker), gradually increasing from SC_Paderborn_(Sunmaker) to SV_Werder_Bremen_(Wiesenhof), and lastly roughly constant from SV_Werder_Bremen_(Wiesenhof) to Union_Berlin_(Aroundtown).
The line rapidly increased by 265.0% from Year SC_Paderborn_(Sunmaker) to SV_Werder_Bremen_(Wiesenhof).
The most drastic increase took place within the Year SC_Paderborn_(Sunmaker) and SV_Werder_Bremen_(Wiesenhof).
Maximum Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros, about 7.3 was reported at Year SV_Werder_Bremen_(Wiesenhof)
The lowest Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros, of value 2.0 was reported at Year SC_Paderborn_(Sunmaker)
